title: Ep. - 208 - SPICE ADAMS, CO-HOST OF THE GREAT AMERICAN BAKING SHOW
description:
Spice Adams is a former NFL defensive tackle for the San Francisco 49s and The Chicago Bears, and co-host of the The Great American Baking Show. He talks about how he was cast for the show, whether the show has made him a food snob, and the most hilarious moment from this season. 

 

Actor Doug Budin is put through a baking quiz and then forced to choose whether he would make one of the recipes that has been made on The Great American Baking Show. 

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey 

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
